video_description:
http://www.techbargains.com/toshiba -- Check out the latest coupons and deals for Toshiba products here.

Here's our review of the Toshiba Thrive 7" Tablet. Specs include an Nvidia Tegra 2 dual core processor running at 1GHz, 1GB of RAM, 16GB of internal storage that's expandable via MicroSD card, a 5 megapixel rear facing camera and 2 megapixel front facing camera, and a 7 inch capacitive multi-touch screen with a native resolution of 1280x800 .

Check out http://www.techbargains.com/ for deals and info on the latest technology gadgets.
title: Toshiba Thrive 7" Tablet Video Review

comments.text: The wifi, sound and camera on my 10.1 Thrive have exactly the same issues. All they did it seems is shrink the screen. My HP Toouchpad running CM 9, ICS blow away my Thrive. Imagine? It just shows how bad Toshiba and HP are for very different reasons. HP for quiting before they even started and Toshiba for making a very mediocre product. Worse yet, the baked a lot of big bloatware﻿ into the ROM so you have to root it to get rid of the junk and reclaim your app space
comments.author: kikcodog
